description.main_subject: Video game dialogue box with an old man character
description.detailed_description: A pixel art video game user interface displays a dialogue box featuring an old man character with a white beard and green shirt. The box presents a welcoming message and three interactive options, set against a warm, rustic background of green foliage. The overall mood is inviting and indicative of a narrative or quest interaction.
description.text_content: Welcome, traveler. This town holds pieces of Yash's journey. Where would you like to go? Tell me about Yash Show me his projects Whah skills dess he heve?
